fields.name: ColdCheckTextTips
fields.fieldText:
TIPS

~ Take a moment to validate / update your email message. Email signature details is based your user record details in BI - you may have to update it before sending the Email

~ Remember, emails are sent 'FROM' the lead owner (i.e. you)

value.stringValue: If no error message is displayed in the PRE-WORK section, your email was sent

fields.name: InvalidDateMessage
fields.fieldText:
OH NO - HERE'S WHAT'S WRONG


You did not specify the follow-up date prior to clicking the button to create the task, or you set a date in the past.


Click 'Previous' to go back, specify a valid date for a scheduled Lead follow-up reminder, and click on 'Create Task'.

fields.name: InvalidUserMessage
fields.fieldText:
OH NO - HERE'S WHAT'S WRONG


The task is automatically assigned to the current lead owner. It looks like this lead is still owned by a Queue, or a user that is no longer active.


Take ownership of the lead first, prior to creating a follow-up task.


TIP: After updating the Lead Owner, refresh your browser window before proceeding

fields.name: OwnerErrorMessage
fields.fieldText:
OH NO - HERE'S WHAT'S WRONG


To send this email, you must be the lead owner and have a valid email address for your user record in BI.


Click Previous to go back to the Pre-Work tab. Take ownership of the lead first, and try sending the email again.


TIP: If you are the lead owner, contact businessInsight@United.com to validate the email address on your user record

textTemplates.name: WarmLeadTemplate
textTemplates.text:
{!Lead.FirstName},



Thank you for your inquiry about United’s business programs. I’d like to connect with you to discuss your travel, so that I can help you determine the United business program that will best fit your needs. In the meantime, please provide the following information:




o How much do you/your corporation spend on air travel on an annual basis?


o Interested in Individual program or Corporate program?


o Do you utilize a travel agency?


o How do you currently book travel?


o Do your travelers mainly fly domestic and/or international?


o Which do you do more of: Last minute travel or book in advance?


o How often do you change or cancel your flights?




Thank you in advance!
